title: Is the Internet Making You Lazy? (Here’s How to Reclaim Your Ambition.)
summary:
Cal Newport explains how the internet is making you lazing in episode 389 of the Deep Questions podcast.

Buy Cal Newport's latest book, “Slow Productivity” at www.calnewport.com/slow
